.claude/CLAUDE.md.description: Main orchestration instructions - Router protocol, agent routing table, spawn patterns

.claude/lib/platform.cjs.description: Cross-platform utilities - NULL_DEVICE, isWindows, shellQuote, suppressStderr

.claude/lib/memory/memory-manager.cjs.description: Session-based memory system with read-time truncation

.claude/settings.json.description: Missing SessionEnd hook - this is why only session_001.json exists

.claude/hooks/safety/windows-null-saniti.description: Sanitizes /dev/null to NUL in bash commands on Windows

.claude/context/memory/.description: Memory storage - sessions/, gotchas.json, patterns.json, codebase_map.json

.claude/hooks/memory/session-end-recorde.description: SessionEnd hook that auto-saves session summaries to memory system on session end

.claude/hooks/routing/planner-first-guar.description: 16 integration tests for planner-first enforcement: blocks DEVELOPER/QA/DEVOPS/ARCHITECT for EPIC/HIGH complexity until PLANNER spawned, allows PLANNER to break cycle, validates warn/off modes, tests full flow from prompt analysis to Task blocking
